person.persName: John Jordan (John Strauss) (Jefferson County, Kentucky, barber)

body.p: Jefferson County and Franklin County, Kentucky, barber and inmate. Kentucky native. Barber in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1859. Convicted of larceny against Joseph Bondurant in Jefferson County on October 18, 1859. Prisoner in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Frankfort from October 25, 1859, until April 1861. Pardoned by Governor Beriah Magoffin on April 1, 1861.
